statements: SELECT * FROM vendor_relationships;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person, contact_email FROM vendor_relationships;
SELECT * FROM vendor_relationships WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT vendor_name FROM vendor_relationships ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, contact_person FROM vendor_relationships ORDER BY vendor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM vendor_relationships WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, contact_person FROM vendor_relationships WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT contact_person, contact_email FROM vendor_relationships WHERE vendor_name LIKE '%Corp%';
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, compliance_status FROM vendor_relationships ORDER BY compliance_status DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendor_relationships WHERE vendor_name = 'ABC Corp' AND compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM vendor_relationships;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_name FROM vendor_relationships WHERE procurement_policy_compliance = TRUE;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_email FROM vendor_relationships WHERE vendor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM vendor_relationships WHERE vendor_id < 5 ORDER BY vendor_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM procurement_policies WHERE policy_status = 'active';
SELECT vendor_name, contact_name, contact_email FROM vendor_relationships WHERE procurement_policy_compliance = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM vendor_relationships WHERE vendor_id = 2;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_email FROM vendor_relationships WHERE vendor_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM vendor_relationships WHERE contact_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, contact_email FROM vendor_relationships WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'A%' AND contact_email LIKE '%@gmail.com' ORDER BY vendor_id;
SELECT * FROM vendor_details;
SELECT vendor_name, location FROM vendor_details;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_email FROM vendor_details ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM vendor_compliance WHERE passed_compliance = TRUE;
SELECT v.vendor_name, p.description FROM vendor_details v JOIN procurement_policies p ON v.vendor_id = p.policy_id;
SELECT * FROM vendor_details;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_email FROM vendor_details WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT vd.vendor_name, pp.policy_name FROM vendor_details vd INNER JOIN vendor_compliance vc ON vd.vendor_id = vc.vendor_id INNER JOIN procurement_policies pp ON vc.policy_id = pp.policy_id;
SELECT vc.vendor_id, pc.policy_name, vc.date_checked FROM vendor_compliance vc INNER JOIN procurement_policies pp ON vc.policy_id = pp.policy_id WHERE passed_compliance = TRUE;

SELECT vd.vendor_name, vc.passed_compliance, pp.description FROM vendor_details vd INNER JOIN vendor_compliance vc ON vd.vendor_id = vc.vendor_id INNER JOIN procurement_policies pp ON vc.policy_id = pp.policy_id WHERE vc.date_checked >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM vendor_relationships;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_email FROM vendor_relationships WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM procurement_policies;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_name, phone_number FROM vendor_relationships ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports WHERE compliance_status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM vendor_relationships;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_name, contact_email FROM vendor_relationships WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT policy_name FROM procurement_policies WHERE policy_id = 3;
SELECT vendor_name, compliance_status, report_date FROM vendor_relationships r JOIN compliance_reports cr ON r.vendor_id = cr.vendor_id;
SELECT log_id, action_type, timestamp FROM procurement_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM procurement_policies;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location, vendor_contact_person FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_category FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM procurement_policies WHERE policy_description LIKE '%approved%';
SELECT vendor_name, total_amount FROM vendors INNER JOIN contracts ON vendors.vendor_id = contracts.vendor_id;
